name: Accordion for WordPress – Accordion, FAQ, Tabs Shortcode and Widgets
author: ThemeEgg

sections.description:
Accordion for wordpress plugins helps you to make accordion for any post type, taxonomy, woocommerce product, wordpress menu etc.

Some demo shortcode of this plugin:

  • “[afwp_accordion post_type=”post” posts_per_page=”3″][/afwp_accordion]” is demo shortcode.
  • “post_type” set post type posts value to this shortcodes.
  • “posts_per_page” set no of post show from this shortcode.
  • “category” is also attribute of shortcode

Some useful links:

Plugin details : http://themeegg.com/plugins/accordion-for-wp/

Plugin documentations : http://docs.themeegg.com/docs/accordion-for-wp/

Supprot URL : http://themeegg.com/support-forum/

Plugin Demo : https://demo.themeegg.com/plugins/accordion-for-wp/

Features:

  • Post type accordion
  • Category accordion
  • Post per page accordion
  • All WP_Query arguments accepts by this plugins
  • Accordion menu widget
  • Accordion post widget
  • Accordion term widget
  • Shortcode support
  • Incredible support
  • Well documented
  • Translation ready
  • Supports woocommerce product accordion
  • Multiple template support
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server (in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory).
  2. Activate the Accordion for wordpress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Appreance => widgets => start inserting accordion widgets in any of the sidebar.
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere [afwp_accordion post_type=”post” posts_per_page=”3″][/afwp_accordion]
  5. Also you can change attribute of shortcode as you needed, it support all arguments from WP_Query.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server (in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory).
  2. Activate the Accordion for wordpress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Appreance => widgets => start inserting accordion widgets in any of the sidebar.
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere [afwp_accordion post_type=”post” posts_per_page=”3″][/afwp_accordion]
  5. Also you can change attribute of shortcode as you needed, it support all arguments from WP_Query.

What is this plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

Does the plugin work with any WordPress themes?

  • Yes, the plugin is designed to work with any themes that have been coded following WordPress guidelines.

How many argument accepts by this shortcode plugin?

  • All WP_Query arguments args accepts by this plugin.

Can we make accordion of post type?

  • You can make accordion of post type, category, tags or taxonomy also.
